Wheeljack-X::

"Looks like the ball's in our court, Chief," Jackie says, looking at 
Kup.

Empath::

Meanwhile, the Pred femme has other ideas.  Reaching out with her 
mind, she sends electronic signals through the ship's computer, 
overriding Quet's control from within the system itself.  One by one, 
every system begins to lose power - and the control panels are now 
locked out.

Of course, in the process of doing this, she loses her influence on 
Yggdrasil's scanners and registers as a Predacon signature just over 
the ridge behind the Autobot/Maximal group.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> QuetZalcoatl:
> 
> Quezalcoatl looked that the sistems are shutting down "He might

> 
> The male ran to the fallen shipe and soon reached the main 
computer. 
> and typed some buttons, trying to hack the passwords and stop them 
> before they could came in.
> 
> At least he did it and started to work.... It was done, the 
> computers and all the ship was under his command, he opened com 
link 
> to Kup "I don't know who you're but if you and your pals don't left 
> this area you will be history before history begins"
> 
>
